zh.Save.index.117444-4: 请输入英文或者数字或者-或者_
zh.Save.index.117444-32: 视频设备通过GB/T28181接入平台整体分为2部分，包括平台端配置和设备端配置，不同的设备端配置的路径或页面存在差异，但配置项基本大同小异。
zh.Save.index.117444-35: 设备唯一标识，请填写设备端配置的设备编号。
zh.Save.index.117444-37: 只能选择接入方式为GB/T28281的产品，若当前无对应产品，可点击右侧快速添加按钮，填写产品名称和选择GB/T28181类型的网关完成产品创建
zh.Save.index.117444-39: 配置接入密码，设备端配置的密码需与该密码一致。该字段可在产品-设备接入页面进行统一配置，配置后所有设备将继承产品配置。设备单独修改后将脱离继承关系。
zh.Save.index.117444-41: 各个厂家、不同设备型号的设备端配置页面布局存在差异，但配置项基本大同小异，此处以大华摄像头为例作为接入配置示例
zh.Save.index.117444-43: SIP服务器编号填入该设备所属产品-接入方式页面“连接信息”的SIP。
zh.Save.index.117444-44: SIP域通常为SIP服务器编号的前10位。
zh.Save.index.117444-46: SIP服务器IP/端口填入该设备所属产品-接入方式页面中“连接信息”的IP/端口。
zh.Save.index.117444-48: 设备编号为设备唯一性标识，物联网平台的设备接入没有校验该字段，输入任意数字均不影响设备接入平台。
zh.Save.index.117444-50: 填入该设备所属产品-接入方式页面中“GB28281配置”处的接入密码
zh.Save.index.117444-52: 不影响设备接入平台，可保持设备初始化值。
zh.Save.index.117444-53: 视频设备通过RTSP、RTMP固定地址接入平台分为2步。
zh.Save.index.117444-56: 注：当前页面为新增视频设备，新增完成后点击设备的“通道”按钮，添加通道。
zh.Save.index.117444-57: 设备唯一标识，若不填写，系统将自动生成唯一标识。
zh.Save.index.117444-58: 只能选择接入方式为固定地址的产品，若当前无对应产品，可点击右侧快速添加按钮，填写产品名称和选择固定地址类型的网关完成产品创建。
zh.Save.index.117444-59: JetLinks平台支持通过Onvif方式接入视频设备。分为两个部分，包括平台端配置和设备端配置。本文通过海康摄像头为例将onvif视频接入到平台播放。
zh.Save.index.117444-60: 1.本文以海康监控为例演示，登录海康监控设备后台，进入配置>网络>高级配置>集成协议，用户自定义输入用户名和密码，完成用户添加。
zh.Save.index.117444-64: ID：设备唯一标识，若不填写，系统将自动生成唯一标识
zh.Save.index.117444-65: 设备名称：用户自定义输入小于或等于64位字符
zh.Save.index.117444-66: 所属产品：选择接入方式为Onvif的产品，若当前无对应产品，可点击右侧快速添加按钮，填写产品名称和选择Onvif类型的网关完成产品创建
zh.Save.index.117444-67: 接入地址：不同平台的摄像头接入地址组合方式不一致，请参考对应品牌接入Onvif的地址设置。如海康：http://ip/onvif/device_service。IP地址来自于海康监控设备端后台：配置>网络>基本配置>TCP/IP
zh.Save.index.117444-68: 接入账户：输入设备端配置时添加的用户名
zh.Save.index.117444-69: 接入密码：输入设备端配置时添加的密码
zh.Save.index.117444-70: 3.所有配置项填写完成，点击保存。
zh.Save.index.117444-71: JetLinks平台支持通过调用SDK或API请求将第三方系统视频设备数据接入到平台。
zh.Save.index.117444-73: 所属产品：选择接入方式为插件视频接入的产品，若当前无对应产品，可点击右侧快速添加按钮，填写产品名称和选择插件类型的网关完成产品创建。

en.Save.index.117444-4: Please enter English or numbers or - or_
en.Save.index.117444-7: Up to 64 characters can be entered
en.Save.index.117444-22: Up to 64 characters can be input
en.Save.index.117444-32: The video equipment connected to the platform through GB/T28181 is divided into two parts, including platform side configuration and device side configuration. The paths or pages of different device side configurations may differ, but the configuration items are basically the same.
en.Save.index.117444-35: Device unique identifier, please fill in the device number configured on the device end.
en.Save.index.117444-37: Only products with access method GB/T28281 can be selected. If there is currently no corresponding product, you can click the quick add button on the right, fill in the product name, and select the gateway of type GB/T28181 to complete the product creation
en.Save.index.117444-39: Configure the access password, and the password configured on the device side must be consistent with the password. This field can be uniformly configured on the product device access page, and all devices will inherit the product configuration after configuration. After individual modification of the device, it will break away from the inheritance relationship.
en.Save.index.117444-41: The layout of device configuration pages varies among different manufacturers and device models, but the configuration items are basically the same. Here, Dahua camera is taken as an example of access configuration
en.Save.index.117444-43: Fill in the SIP server number in the SIP of the "Connection Information" section on the access method page of the product to which the device belongs.
en.Save.index.117444-44: The SIP domain is usually the first 10 digits of the SIP server number.
en.Save.index.117444-46: Fill in the IP/port of the SIP server in the "Connection Information" section of the device's product access method page.
en.Save.index.117444-48: The device number is the unique identifier of the device. The device access on the IoT platform does not verify this field, and entering any number does not affect the device access to the platform.
en.Save.index.117444-50: Fill in the access password in the "GB28281 Configuration" section of the product access method page to which the device belongs
en.Save.index.117444-52: It does not affect the device's access to the platform and can maintain the device's initialization value.
en.Save.index.117444-53: Video devices can access the platform through RTSP and RTMP fixed addresses in two steps.
en.Save.index.117444-55: 2. Add the channel address under the video.
en.Save.index.117444-56: Note: The current page is for adding video devices. After adding, click the "Channel" button on the device to add a channel.
en.Save.index.117444-57: Unique identifier of the device, if not filled in, the system will automatically generate a unique identifier.
en.Save.index.117444-58: Only products with fixed address access can be selected. If there is currently no corresponding product, you can click the quick add button on the right, fill in the product name, and select the gateway with fixed address type to complete the product creation.
en.Save.index.117444-59: The JetLinks platform supports accessing video devices through Onvif. Divided into two parts, including platform side configuration and device side configuration. This article uses Hikvision cameras as an example to integrate ONVIF videos into the platform for playback.
en.Save.index.117444-60: 1. This article takes Hikvision monitoring as an example to demonstrate. Log in to the Hikvision monitoring device backend, go to Configuration>Network>Advanced Configuration>Integration Protocol, and the user can customize their username and password to complete the user addition.
en.Save.index.117444-64: ID: Unique identifier of the device. If not filled in, the system will automatically generate a unique identifier
en.Save.index.117444-65: Device Name: User defined input less than or equal to 64 characters
en.Save.index.117444-66: Product: Select the product with Onvif access method. If there is currently no corresponding product, click the quick add button on the right, fill in the product name, and select the Onvif type gateway to complete the product creation
en.Save.index.117444-67: Access address: The combination of camera access addresses on different platforms is not consistent. Please refer to the address settings for accessing Onvif for the corresponding brand. Hai Kang: http://ip/onvif/device_service . The IP address comes from the backend of Hikvision monitoring equipment: Configuration>Network>Basic Configuration>TCP/IP
en.Save.index.117444-68: Access account: Enter the username added during device configuration
en.Save.index.117444-69: Access password: Enter the password added during device configuration
en.Save.index.117444-70: 3. Complete all configuration items and click save.
en.Save.index.117444-71: The JetLinks platform supports accessing third-party system video device data to the platform by calling SDK or API requests.
en.Save.index.117444-73: Product: Select the product with plug-in video access as the access method. If there is currently no corresponding product, you can click the quick add button on the right, fill in the product name, and select the gateway of the plug-in type to complete the product creation.
en.Save.index.117444-74: The device ID has been duplicated
